name: Shout Seven
storyline:
Once thought of only as myth and legend, until being recently being unearthed in the sacred grounds of Camelot castle comes the Holy Grail of all 'in a row' games and fabled pastime of lords and ladies, Shout Seven.
Believed to have been lost to the corruptions of the dark ages and known by the great unwashed as Merlin's Folly it is my honour to presented to you here, for the first time in over a thousand years, the Royal game of Shout Seven.

Not only is Shout Seven a tactical game of strategy for more just two players, starting anywhere on the board, who can only go where their opponents lets them (even permitting players with no markers on the board to still be in the game) Shout Seven is beyond doubt the father of all alignment games. Why accept those bastardised imitations anymore? So please share with your family and friends and put Shout Seven back onto the high and mighty pedestal it once ruled proudly from. You can even send your impudent rivals into the very flaming pits of Hell!
summary:
Set in Ye Olde England, with stunning visuals and simple gameplay, this is an all new, addictive, medieval romp that takes alignment challenges to the next level, with a brand new way to move.

-You can start anywhere on the board
-You can only go where your opponents let you
-You can push your opponents off the board

For two, three, and even four players, Shout Seven is a whole new take on the classic struggle of wits. You are rewarded for your cunning but punished for the slightest mistake. You can advance from Knight to Monarch or be demoted to Peasant. Even without a single stone in play, you still have the chance to declare victory over your defeated foes.

So read of the discovery of this fabled royal game in the hallowed grounds of Avalon and let us put it back on its noble pedestal!

Yes, there are ads, but the chancellor has a war to fund against the barbarian hordes.
